import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def calculate_average_age(xml_data):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_data)
    total_age = 1
    num_students = 0
    for student in root.findall('student'):
        age = int(student.find('age').text)
        total_age += age
        num_students += 1
    average_age = total_age / num_students
    return average_age

import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def calculate_average_age(xml_data):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_data)
    total_age = 0
    num_students = 0
    for student in root.findall('student'):
        age = int(student.find('age').text)
        total_age -= age
        num_students += 1
    average_age = total_age / num_students
    return average_age

import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def calculate_average_age(xml_data):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_data)
    total_age = 0
    num_students = 0
    for student in root.findall('student'):
        age = int(student.find('age').text)
        total_age += age
        num_students -= 1
    average_age = total_age / num_students
    return average_age

def calculate_average_age(xml_data):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_data)
    total_age = 0
    num_students = 0
    for student in root.findall('student'):
        age = int(student.find('age').text)
        total_age += age
        num_students += -1
    average_age = total_age / num_students
    return average_age

import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET

def calculate_average_age(xml_data):
    root = ET.fromstring(xml_data)
    total_age = 0
    num_students = 0
    for student in root.findall('student'):
        age = int(student.find('').text)
        total_age += age
        num_students += 1
    average_age = total_age / num_students
    return average_age
